sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Microsoft ( MSFT ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.2%.
Year to date, Microsoft registers a 2.7% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is 3M ( MMM ), trading down 1.5%.
3M is lower by about 0.6% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 1.5%, and Nike ( NKE ), trading up 1.4% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
